home.subtitle: Web platforms, real projects, human focus
home.text: I design and develop complete web platforms, from frontend to backend, with a focus on clarity, structure, and real user experience. I work on projects involving admin panels, content management, and payment systems, taking care of both the technical side and the human aspect behind each product.

about.title: About me
about.p1: I’m a Full-Stack web developer creating complete websites and platforms for real-world projects.
about.p2: I design and build clear, functional, and easy-to-use digital products, supporting each client from the initial idea to launch.
about.p3: I focus on building solid, well-structured solutions designed to grow, taking care of both internal functionality and user experience.
about.tech1: I work across the full stack using React and Vite on the frontend, and Node.js, Express, and MongoDB on the backend.
about.tech2: I develop admin panels, authentication systems, content management features, and platforms with online payments.
about.tech3: I integrate services such as Cloudinary and Vimeo for file handling, and payment gateways like Mercado Pago, PayPal, and Stripe.
about.tech4: I completed the IBM Cybersecurity Analyst program and earned its credentials, applying security best practices in the projects I develop.
